questions.question: What are ocean currents?

options.text: Movements of ocean water in a definite direction

questions.answer: Movements of ocean water in a definite direction

questions.question: Which current flows along the eastern coast of India?
questions.answer: East Indian Current

questions.question: Warm currents originate near the ____.
questions.answer: Equator

questions.question: Cold currents originate near the ____.
questions.answer: Poles

questions.question: Which is a warm ocean current?
questions.answer: Gulf Stream

questions.question: Which current affects the climate of Western Europe?
questions.answer: Gulf Stream

questions.question: Which is a cold ocean current?
questions.answer: Peru Current

questions.question: Ocean currents are influenced by ____.
questions.answer: Wind and Earth’s rotation

questions.question: Which current flows near the western coast of South America?
questions.answer: Peru Current

questions.question: What is the effect of warm currents on climate?
questions.answer: Moderate climate

questions.question: What are ocean currents?
questions.answer: Ocean currents are continuous movements of ocean water in a definite direction.

questions.question: Name two warm ocean currents.
questions.answer: Gulf Stream and Kuroshio are warm ocean currents.

questions.question: Name two cold ocean currents.
questions.answer: Labrador Current and Peru Current are cold ocean currents.

questions.question: How do ocean currents affect climate?
questions.answer: They influence temperature, rainfall and climate of coastal regions.

questions.question: What factors influence ocean currents?
questions.answer: Winds, rotation of the Earth and temperature differences influence ocean currents.
